proxyHost: {localhost, IP Address or Fully Qualified Domain Name of machine in which AIQ runs}
proxyPort: {9090, port in which Test Designer runs}
capturePort: {9191, port used in Proxy settings of this device}

capabilities.systemPort: {8201, or any value between 8200 - 8299 unique to this device}

app: {Absolute path or URL of .apk, needed if Application is not installed, otherwise is optional}
